soprano.properties.castep package¶

Module containing AtomsProperties related specifically to CASTEP calculations. Some of these can be looked up only in a CASTEP Calculator; others require passing the path of the .castep file as a parameter and actually parsing its contents.

Submodules¶

  • soprano.properties.castep.castep module
